metadata.default: Christoph Derszteler - Software engineer, student and music enthusiast
metadata.description: I’m Christoph, a software engineer and student based in Bonn, Germany. I started freelancing in 2022 and have been passionate about it ever since. In 2024 I started studying computer science at the university in Bonn.
